item.description:
@light6 wrote:

I’m trying to add the skipping emote by putting a code in wearitem.java but it doesn’t seem to work. Heres the code. Can someone assist me with this?

} if(c.wearId == 4565) { c.sendMessage("You Are Now Skipping!!!!"); c.startAnimation(1836); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
